apple/ml-stable-diffusion

Run Stable Diffusion on Apple Silicon with Core ML

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • library for speeding up diffusion models
  • Stable Diffusion inference on CPU
  • Fine-tunes LLMs on Apple silicon
  • minimal deep learning library that runs LLaMA and Stable Diffusion
  • LLM training framework for Apple Silicon
  • Open source toolkit for training diffusion image models with a simple web or command line interface—supports latest models, requires high-end Nvidia GPU
  • Stable Diffusion on Android with NPU acceleration
  • Scans your AI-generated images, grabs all the metadata and workflow info, and lets you search, tag, and organize everything—handy for keeping track of your Stable Diffusion creations
